Welcome

This is the personal website of Hirotaka Fukui, a graduate student in Economics.
I have included information about my research, CV, and how to get in touch with me.

About Me

I am a graduate student in Economics at Kobe University, Graduate School of Economics.

My research focuses on International Macroeconomics, Monetary Economics, Emerging and Developing Economies, with a particular emphasis on Sub-Saharan Africa.
